org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream

类 AsyncDataStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.AsyncDataStream

  • @PublicEvolving
public class AsyncDataStream
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to apply AsyncFunction to a data stream. 

    
 DataStream<String> input = ...
 AsyncFunction<String, Tuple<String, String>> asyncFunc = ...

 AsyncDataStream.orderedWait(input, asyncFunc, timeout, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, 100);

      Output mode for asynchronous operations.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addOperator

        private static <IN,OUT> SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT> addOperator(DataStream<IN> in,
                                                                    AsyncFunction<IN,OUT> func,
                                                                    long timeout,
                                                                    int bufSize,
                                                                    AsyncDataStream.OutputMode mode)
        Add an AsyncWaitOperator.
        类型参数:
        IN - Input type.
        OUT - Output type.
        参数:
        in - The DataStream where the AsyncWaitOperator will be added.
        func - AsyncFunction wrapped inside AsyncWaitOperator.
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation to complete
        bufSize - The max number of inputs the AsyncWaitOperator can hold inside.
        mode - Processing mode for AsyncWaitOperator.
        返回:
        A new SingleOutputStreamOperator

      • unorderedWait

        public static <IN,OUT> SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT> unorderedWait(DataStream<IN> in,
                                                                     AsyncFunction<IN,OUT> func,
                                                                     long timeout,
                                                                     java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit,
                                                                     int capacity)
        Add an AsyncWaitOperator. The order of output stream records may be reordered.
        类型参数:
        IN - Type of input record
        OUT - Type of output record
        参数:
        in - Input DataStream
        func - AsyncFunction
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation to complete
        timeUnit - of the given timeout
        capacity - The max number of async i/o operation that can be triggered
        返回:
        A new SingleOutputStreamOperator.

      • unorderedWait

        public static <IN,OUT> SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT> unorderedWait(DataStream<IN> in,
                                                                     AsyncFunction<IN,OUT> func,
                                                                     long timeout,
                                                                     java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Add an AsyncWaitOperator. The order of output stream records may be reordered.
        类型参数:
        IN - Type of input record
        OUT - Type of output record
        参数:
        in - Input DataStream
        func - AsyncFunction
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation to complete
        timeUnit - of the given timeout
        返回:
        A new SingleOutputStreamOperator.

      • orderedWait

        public static <IN,OUT> SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT> orderedWait(DataStream<IN> in,
                                                                   AsyncFunction<IN,OUT> func,
                                                                   long timeout,
                                                                   java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit,
                                                                   int capacity)
        Add an AsyncWaitOperator. The order to process input records is guaranteed to be the same as input ones.
        类型参数:
        IN - Type of input record
        OUT - Type of output record
        参数:
        in - Input DataStream
        func - AsyncFunction
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation to complete
        timeUnit - of the given timeout
        capacity - The max number of async i/o operation that can be triggered
        返回:
        A new SingleOutputStreamOperator.

      • orderedWait

        public static <IN,OUT> SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT> orderedWait(DataStream<IN> in,
                                                                   AsyncFunction<IN,OUT> func,
                                                                   long timeout,
                                                                   java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Add an AsyncWaitOperator. The order to process input records is guaranteed to be the same as input ones.
        类型参数:
        IN - Type of input record
        OUT - Type of output record
        参数:
        in - Input DataStream
        func - AsyncFunction
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation to complete
        timeUnit - of the given timeout
        返回:
        A new SingleOutputStreamOperator.
